spec.help: The HTTPS URL that hosts the image.
spec.name: imageUrl
spec.label: Image URL

spec.help: The alternative text of this image, used for accessibility.
spec.name: altText

spec.help:
The wrap text setting.
If `true`, the text wraps and displays on multiple lines.
Otherwise, the text is truncated.
Only applies to `Text`, not `Top Label` and `BottomLabel`.
spec.name: wrapText
spec.label: Wrap Text

spec.help:
The text that appears above Text.
Always truncates.

spec.help:
The text that appears below Text.
Always truncates.

spec.help: The value entered by a user, returned as part of a form input event.
